attr.name: offlineAccountsOrder
attr.desc: visual order of all accounts in desktop UI

attr.name: offlineModifiedAttrs
attr.desc: internal: set of attributes modified since the last synchronization

attr.name: offlineDeletedIdentity
attr.desc: internal: set of ids of identities deleted since the last synchronization

attr.name: offlineDeletedDataSource
attr.desc: internal: set of ids of data sources deleted since the last synchronization

attr.name: offlineDeletedSignature
attr.desc: internal: set of ids of signatures deleted since the last synchronization

attr.name: offlineRemotePassword
attr.desc: the account's password on the remote server

attr.name: offlineRemoteServerUri
attr.desc: base URI of the remote Zimbra server

attr.name: offlineWebappUri
attr.desc: prism webapp uri

attr.name: offlineRemoteHost
attr.desc: host of the remote Zimbra server

attr.name: offlineRemotePort
attr.desc: port of the remote Zimbra server

attr.name: offlineRemoteSsl
attr.desc: whether use ssl to access remote Zimbra server

attr.name: offlineRemoteServerVersion
attr.desc: version number of remote Zimbra server

attr.name: offlineProxyHost
attr.desc: proxy server hostname

attr.name: offlineProxyPort
attr.desc: proxy server port

attr.name: offlineProxyUser
attr.desc: proxy server username

attr.name: offlineProxyPass
attr.desc: proxy server password

attr.name: offlineAccountFlavor
attr.desc: Flavor of account type (i.e. Ymail, Gmail, Live, MobileMe, Zimbra, Pop, Imap...)

attr.name: offlineAccountName
attr.desc: A user given name for a Zimbra account

attr.name: offlineFeatureSmtpEnabled
attr.desc: whether sending messages from an account is enabled

attr.name: offlineSyncFreq
attr.desc: Zimbra account sync frequency in seconds, where -1 means manually and 0 means push

attr.name: offlineSyncStatus
attr.desc: status of the last sync attempt, unknown means never attempted since server start

attr.name: offlineLastSync
attr.desc: the last time (milli since epoch) this Zimbra account was successfully synced

attr.name: offlineEnableTrace
attr.desc: whether enable debug trace of this account

attr.name: offlineDataSourceType
attr.desc: which type of data source the data source is

attr.name: offlineDataSourceName
attr.desc: name of the sole data source in a data source account

attr.name: offlineGalAccountId
attr.desc: account id of the GAL account associated with a sync account

attr.name: offlineGalAccountSyncToken
attr.desc: sync token from last SyncGal response

attr.name: offlineGalAccountDataSourceId
attr.desc: data source id for gal sync account

attr.name: zimbraPrefShareContactsInAutoComplete
attr.desc: if true, include all contacts of this account in address auto-completion, in other accounts compose window

attr.name: offlineGalAccountLastFullSync
attr.desc: last time (days since epoch) the system did a full sync

attr.name: offlineGalAccountLastRefresh
attr.desc: last time (days since epoch) gal maintenance task was run

attr.name: offlineGalGroupMembersPopulated
attr.desc: whether we have populated group member lists for this gal account yet

attr.name: offlineMountpointProxyAccountId
attr.desc: id of the offline acount through which access to mountpoints is proxied

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceContactSyncEnabled
attr.desc: whether contact synchronization is enabled

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceCalendarSyncEnabled
attr.desc: whether calendar synchronization is enabled

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpEnabled
attr.desc: whether oubound mail sending is allowed in this data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpHost
attr.desc: host of smtp associated with this data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpPort
attr.desc: port number of smtp associated with this data source

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpConnectionType
attr.desc: security layer for smtp connection

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpAuthRequired
attr.desc: whether smtp associated with this data source requires authentication

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpAuthUsername
attr.desc: smtp authentication username

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSmtpAuthPassword
attr.desc: smtp authentication password

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSyncFreq
attr.desc: data source sync frequency in seconds, where -1 means manually and 0 means push

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSyncStatus
attr.desc: status of the last attempt to sync this data source, unknown means never attempted since server start

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceLastSync
attr.desc: the last time (milli since epoch) this data source was successfully synced

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceSyncAllServerFolders
attr.desc: whether to auto-enable sync on all server folders

attr.name: zimbraDataSourceCalendarFolderId
attr.desc: root folder for for calendar

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailtoHandlerEnabled
attr.desc: whether to register as mailto link handler

attr.name: zimbraPrefMailtoAccountId
attr.desc: the account ID of the account for mailto handling

attr.name: offlineClientId
attr.desc: a unique ID of this client

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineBackupInterval
attr.desc: interval to run account backup

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineBackupAccountId
attr.desc: account ID(s) to backup

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineBackupPath
attr.desc: path for backup output

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineBackupKeep
attr.desc: number of backups to keep for each acct

attr.name: offlineBackupLastSuccess
attr.desc: timestamp of last backup success

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineZimletSyncAccountId
attr.desc: account ID to sync zimlets with

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineAttrProxyMode
attr.desc: Proxy config mode; one of MANUAL, NONE, or SYSTEM

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineHttpProxyHost
attr.desc: HTTP/S Proxy hostname; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineHttpProxyPort
attr.desc: HTTP/S Proxy port; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineHttpProxyUsername
attr.desc: HTTP/S Proxy username; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineHttpProxyPassword
attr.desc: HTTP/S Proxy password; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineSocksProxyHost
attr.desc: SOCKS Proxy hostname; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineSocksProxyPort
attr.desc: SOCKS Proxy port; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineSocksProxyUsername
attr.desc: SOCKS Proxy username; used if mode set to Manual

attr.name: zimbraPrefOfflineSocksProxyPassword
attr.desc: SOCKS Proxy password; used if mode set to Manual
